caption: This photograph depicts an industrial scene juxtaposed with natural elements. In the foreground, a bright yellow sunflower and various grasses are prominently displayed, sharply contrasting with the industrial backdrop. A body of water in the middle ground reflects some of the industrial structures and is slightly agitated, perhaps due to wind. The industrial complex in the background includes large buildings under construction with visible scaffolding, cranes, and various types of heavy machinery. Multiple layers of pipes and steel frameworks are evident. The environment around the facility includes manicured green grass and a small, man-made embankment bordering the water. Also visible are high-voltage power lines and utility poles, enhancing the industrial feel of the scene. The sky is partly cloudy, suggesting an early day or late afternoon setting with ample natural light.
title: The p.h.  Robinson generating plant, part of Houston lighting and power
